column4: hi, folks... I'm a pretty inexperienced 10.04 user having an issue with the panel on top of the desktop screen. For the second time since I installed 10.04 last week, it opened without the logout option or the internet connections indicator. Any ideas?
that happens now and then here too - just log out an in again
let me check -- I didn't see the "logout button" part
right click on the panel, add to panel, select "log out"
